</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:192PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Comply with all Applicable Environmental Law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;represents and warrants, to the best of its knowledge, that there has not been any release of Hazardous Substances nor has there been any storage, treatment, use, disposal, release or threatened release of any Hazardous Substance on the Premises prior to the term of Lease or any extension of it.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;shall
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(g)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	indemnify, defend, protect and hold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;harmless from any and against all actions, fines, penalties, costs (including reasonable attorney&#8217;s fees and costs through all proceedings, trials, appeals and collection proceedings) or losses due to claims, actions, investigations, remediations, cleanup actions, monitoring or other matters involving the use of the Property, including the Premises, prior to the Commencement Date of this Lease.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	PART A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MONETARY OBLIGATIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Basic Rent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. The Basic Rent is paid in monthly installments, in advance and without demand, deduction, or offset. The first installment is due by the Commencement Date. The next installments are due on the first day of each month after the Commencement Date throughout the term of this Lease. If the Commencement Date, Expiration Date, or any earlier termination date does not fall on the first or last day of a calendar month, then the installment for each such month is prorated on a daily basis.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Additional Rent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Under this Lease, &#8220;Additional Rent&#8221; shall mean any amounts, liabilities, or obligations, including without limitation,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;Share (as hereinafter defined), and any other costs and expenses payable by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;under this Lease, except for Basic Rent and Liquidated Damages (as hereinafter defined). The term &#8220;rent,&#8221; as used in this document, shall mean Basic Rent and Additional Rent, as all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;obligations under this Lease are mutual and dependent covenants.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Without limitation,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;has the same rights and remedies with respect to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;Share of any Additional Rent as for the Basic Rent. Any Additional Rent is prorated as of the Commencement Date and the Expiration Date, or any earlier termination date, unless this Lease expressly provides otherwise.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Option to Extend Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;shall have the right and option to extend the term for two (2) additional periods of sixty (60) months each on the same terms and conditions as are set forth herein except that Basic Rent for any renewal term shall be an amount equal to ninety percent (90%) of the fair market rental value for similar Premises in the same geographic region as Premises.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. All payments to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;are deemed received only when collected in legal tender of the United States of America. Any such payment not made by United States legal tender is received subject to collection. If any such payment is not so collected, it is not &#8220;made,&#8221; &#8220;paid,&#8221; or &#8220;received&#8221; for any purpose, including accrual of any interest. What commonly is called &#8220;immediately available funds&#8221; is equivalent to legal tender. All rent is paid at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;address on the Summary Page or as hereinafter designated by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;in writing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Default Interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Any payment to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;not received within fifteen (15) days after it is due bears interest, from its original due date through the date received by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;in legal tender, at the lesser of: (i) the annual rate of 10%, calculated on the basis of a 365-day year for the number of days actually outstanding, or (ii) the maximum annual rate permitted by any applicable usury law of the state where the Property is situated. Any advances properly made, or costs or expenses properly paid, by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;after any Event of Default bear such interest from the respective dates of advance or payment, as the case may be.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Late Charge.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;may impose a late charge, due on demand, of not more than five (5) percent of any installment of rent that is not received within seven (7) days after it is due. Any such late
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage108"></A>
<A NAME="EX10_21_HTM_SAB09517C7249690A58CF802B9F269C6C">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	charge is in lieu of interest on such installment as described above in Paragraph B.5, but it otherwise is in addition to, and does not waive, limit, or otherwise impair, any other right or remedy of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Security Deposit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Intentionally Waived
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Application
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Intentionally Waived
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Basic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Rent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Intentionally Waived
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Intentionally Waived
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S Share. TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will pay to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Share of the total dollar amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	operating expenses for the Property, determined according to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	accounting practices and the terms of this Lease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8220;TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Share&#8221; is determined by dividing the Premises Leasable Square Footage by the Property Leasable Square Footage and will be adjusted for any material change in such square footages resulting from any expansion, consolidation, or diminution of the Property Leasable Square Footage, whether caused by any casualty, taking, or other event. The first payment under this paragraph is due on demand and payable along with the monthly Basic Rent. Such payments are estimated, in advance, as provided below. If any estimated amount is in effect on the Contract Date, it is set forth as the &#8220;Additional Rent&#8221; on the Summary Page of this Lease.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	13.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Operating Expenses:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Defined as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Included Expenses.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Means any costs and expenses incurred by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	for operating and maintaining the Property. It includes (i) all real estate taxes, charges, assessments, fees and payments levied or assessed, at any time, on the Property during the term of this lease by any public, governmental, or regulatory body, including those payable under any recorded covenants affecting the Property; (ii) insurance premiums; (iii) repairs (excluding the cost of repairs for which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;is solely responsible pursuant to Paragraph D.1); (iv) building and landscape maintenance and lighting (including any project signs, parkways, and medians on, adjoining, or serving the Property); (v) reasonable management fees (regardless of whether paid to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or an affiliate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD);
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(vi) common utilities serving the Property not separately metered or otherwise charged to a particular
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(vii) reasonable general advertising and promotional expenses for the Property, (viii) any restoration costs to the extent of commercially reasonable deductible amounts for the Property&#8217;s insurance; (ix) compensation for any consultants or other professionals employed to review or contest the Property&#8217;s taxes, insurance costs, or other operating expenses; and (x) taxes, fees, and other exactions imposed upon or with respect to any of the foregoing by any sovereign, including any gross receipts taxes to the extent not paid by the Property&#8217;s tenants and not in lieu of, or direct credit against,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	state and federal income taxes or property taxes.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Excluded Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Excludes all of the following: (i) debt service and other payments with respect to any loan; (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	state and federal income taxes; (iii) depreciation and other non-cash items; (iv) leasing commissions, architectural fees, and other direct expenses incurred to procure particular tenants for the Property, including improvements, equipment, fixtures, and other items installed to the requirements of a particular
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and any allowances or concessions provided to any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	; (v) any costs of any restoration that individually exceed commercially reasonable deductible amounts for the insurance coverage applicable to the Property; (vi) accounting fees and other professional services incurred by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	and costs of audits of any kind; (vii) renovations or other alterations required to conform the Property to any legal requirements or insurance requirements; (viii) costs incurred to make major repairs or replacements of any defective initial construction of the Property and related appurtenances regardless of how such costs are characterized under generally accepted accounting principles; (ix) legal expenses incurred in connection with the preparation or negotiation of leases, subleases, assignments or other lease-related documents with current, prior or prospective tenants or occupants of the Property; (x) marketing or advertising costs to solicit new tenants and the rental value or lost income to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of any office space in the Property utilized for the leasing of the Property (as opposed to management of the
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage109"></A>
<A NAME="EX10_21_HTM_SAB09517C7249690A58CF802B9F269C6C">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Property); (xi) wages, salaries, fees, and fringe benefits paid to administrative or executive personnel or officers or partners of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	not having direct day to day responsibility for operating or providing services to the Property; (xii) cost of repairs or other work occasioned by fire, windstorm or other casualty of an insurable nature or by the exercise of eminent domain; (xiii) costs incurred for alterations, replacements or improvements that would be considered capital improvements under sound accounting and management principles consistently applied, except current amortization of the capital improvement cost over the reasonable useful life of the improvement where such capital improvement is reasonably necessary to improve the operation or maintenance efficiency of the Property; (xiv) amortization of capital improvements except as expressly provided above; (xv) expenses in connection with services or other benefits of a type which are not provided or available to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	but which are provided to another
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Property or to some other third party; (xvi) costs incurred due to violation by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of the Property of the terms or conditions of any lease; (xvii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	general overhead except as it directly relates to the management and operation of the Property; (xviii) all items and services for which any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;reimburses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or pays third persons and any cost that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is responsible for under the terms of the Lease; (xix) costs for sculptures, paintings or other objects of art; (xx) ground lease rental payments; (xx) costs incurred in connection with the removal or clean-up of Hazardous Substances from the Property unless such costs of clean-up is the fault of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT; (xxi)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	costs incurred in connection with negotiations or disputes with tenants of the Property; and (xxii) any costs, fines or penalties incurred due to actual or alleged violations by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	of any governmental rule or authority.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any operating expenses incurred by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	with respect to the Property and other properties owned or managed by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will be apportioned to the Property on a commercially reasonable basis, provided such expenses are not part of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;general overhead and relate directly to the management and operation of the Property. Absent any other reasonable basis, such expenses will be apportioned in the ratio of the approximate leasable square footages contained in the respective properties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	14.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Estimates.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Each calendar year,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will estimate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Share of the operating expenses, based upon actual and projected operating results from the Property. If any amount is estimated to become due,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will so notify
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	The estimated amount will be payable monthly, in advance and without demand, together with the Basic Rent, beginning the first month after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is given at least fifteen (15) days advance notice of the amount, and will continue until re-estimated under this paragraph. Such estimated amounts will be reconciled with the actual operating expenses from the Property within ninety (90) days after the end of each calendar year. Any excess in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	favor will be credited against the next ensuing payments or refunded to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	option. Any excess in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	favor will be due within fifteen (15) days of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	receipt of an invoice from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If the actual operating expenses from the Property materially exceed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	estimate during any fiscal quarter, then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	upon not less than fifteen (15) days advance notice, may increase the monthly payments (i) to amortize the amount of the deficiency over the number of months then remaining in the fiscal quarter, and (ii) to cover any anticipated continuing increase.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	15.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Verification. LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	must maintain accurate and separate books and records to substantiate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	operating expenses for the Property, which must be available for inspection by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	upon reasonable advance notice.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may require an audit, at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;expense, of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;books and records for the Property to determine if any amounts paid by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;were based upon a material overstatement of the actual operating expenses for the Property. Any variance determined by such audited results will be accounted between the parties, with any difference due either party paid within thirty (30) days after demand. If
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;Share of operating costs was overstated by more than ten percent (10%),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;shall pay to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;its reasonable costs and expenses incurred
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage110"></A>
<A NAME="EX10_21_HTM_SAB09517C7249690A58CF802B9F269C6C">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	in connection with the audit, which costs and expenses shall not be recoverable in an amount greater than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;Share of said overstatement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;to provide sufficient details of operating expenses at year end to justify CAM costs.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	16.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Contesting Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;agrees to use its reasonable and affirmative best efforts to contest any tax, fee or assessment wholly or partially paid or reimbursed by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;to the same extent as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;would contest the same if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;had paid the tax, fee or assessment itself without reimbursement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;shall reimburse
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;Proportionate Share of any and all amounts recovered by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;as a result of such contest.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	17.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will pay when due the following costs and expenses related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;use of the Premises:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Utilities. Any electrical, telecommunications, natural gas, refuse collection, and other utilities furnished to the Premises,, which utilities are separately metered and invoiced directly to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;by the utility company
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Increase. Any increase in taxes, insurance premiums, and other operating expenses for the Property that are attributable to any use, activity, or installation by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;within or with respect to the Premises. Illustrative items include any property tax increase attributable to any leasehold improvements made by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, insurance charges for any extra-hazardous use of the Premises made by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, charges for common utilities resulting from abnormal consumption or use by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, and increased maintenance costs for any of the Property&#8217;s common areas resulting from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;overuse.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Damage. Any costs of restoring any damage to the Property, including the Common Utility systems, caused by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or any person subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;right of control or actual control.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;Taxes. Any taxes assessed with respect to (i) any of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;personal property, tangible or intangible, including any of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;inventory and equipment; (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;exercise of any taxable privilege on, from, or with respect to the Premises; (iii) occupational license, franchise, or other fees payable with respect to any activity conducted by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;on or from the Premises; and (iv) the rent, except
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;state and federal income taxes.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;Work. Any charges for labor, services, or materials performed, rendered, or delivered, as the case may be, pursuant to a contract with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;(express or implied, written or oral) for maintaining, restoring, or improving the Premises, or any item fabricated by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;on the Premises.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Liens. Any lien, or claim of lien, asserted against any interest in the Property by, through, under, or against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(g)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Violations. Any fines or other penalties, and any charges or other costs, incurred by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;because of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;violation of any legal requirement, including (i) any building, safety, or other code violation; (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;failure to maintain adequate workmen&#8217;s compensation or similar insurance required with respect to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;activities conducted on or from the Premises; and (iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;failure to comply with any zoning or other legal requirement applicable to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;use of the Premises, including the Permitted Use.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;liability under this subparagraph includes both the costs of correcting any violation of any legal requirement and any costs incurred by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;in defending, compromising, or discharging any enforcement proceeding instituted against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or the Property, or both, because of any such violation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any payments to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;under this Paragraph B.16 are due and payable within Thirty (30) days of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;receipt of an invoice from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;accompanied by evidence that the expense was incurred.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
