<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	18.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Brokerage Commissions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;each represents and warrants to the other that there are no brokers, finder&#8217;s fees or any real estate commissions due to any broker, agent or other party in connection with the negotiation or execution of this Lease or on behalf of either of them, except for commissions owed to CBRichard Ellis The Furman Co. (the &#8220;Broker&#8221;) by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;hereby agree to indemnify and hold the other harmless from and against any and all costs, expenses, liabilities, causes of action, claims or suits by any party for compensation, commissions, fees or other sums claimed to be due or owing with respect to the representation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;as applicable, in effecting this Lease other than for commissions to be paid by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;to the Broker.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	PART B.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	INSTALLATIONS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fixtures. TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may install within the interior of the Premises such fixtures, equipment, and other personal property as are reasonably necessary, convenient, or desirable for conducting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	normal business operations, so long as each such installation complies with all express requirements of this Part C and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is notified and approves in advance of any installation that will be attached to the Property. So long as no Event of Default is continuing,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may remove any of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;property from the Premises.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will remove all such property, and restore any resulting damage to the Property, upon the expiration or any earlier termination of this Lease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	failure to remove such property and restore the Property upon the expiration or earlier termination of the Lease is an immediate Event of Default. Any of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;property remaining on the Premises at any such expiration or earlier termination will become
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	property, at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	option; or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may elect to remove any such property, and restore any resulting damage to the Property, at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;expense.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Alterations. TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may not install any interior alterations or improvements to the Premises without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	advance written consent, which will not be unreasonably withheld or delayed so long as (i) the fair rental value of the Property will not be materially diminished; (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	operating expenses for the Property will not be increased; (iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;agrees to remove such installation and restore the Property upon the expiration or any earlier termination of this Lease, if requested by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	prior to the alteration or installation of the improvement; (iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	furnishes such plans, specifications, and samples as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	reasonably may require; and (v)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	otherwise complies with all applicable requirements of this Part C. Any such installation is a leasehold improvement, to become
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	property upon the expiration or any earlier termination of this Lease, unless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	elects otherwise prior to the alteration or installation of the improvement. Any exterior or structural alterations are prohibited, as are any alterations to any demising wall.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT Work.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any fixture, alteration, or other installation made by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	within or affecting the Premises, including any sign or display, must be completed with reasonable diligence and in a workmanlike manner, consistent with accepted industry practices, any applicable legal requirements and insurance requirements, and such standards as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may from time to time establish for the Property. No such installation may affect adversely the structural integrity of the Property, the usefulness of any of its utility, mechanical, and other systems, or the usefulness of any demising wall.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	must protect the Property from damage by water, vandalism, and other casualty resulting from, or occurring during the course of, any such installation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	summarily may remove any installation begun or made in violation of the express requirements of this Lease, without waiving, limiting or otherwise impairing any other right or remedy.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conditions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	As a condition precedent to any installation by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT, TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	shall furnish proof of adequate insurance coverage, protecting the Property,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	and the installation, and adequate security for any of the following: (i) restoring any damage to the Property resulting from such installation; (ii) payment of any claims for labor, services, or materials furnished, rendered, or delivered in connection with such installation; (iii) completing such installation in compliance any applicable legal requirements, insurance requirements, and any plans and specifications approved by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	and (iv) if applicable, removing such installation, and restoring the Property, upon the expiration or any earlier
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage112"></A>
<A NAME="EX10_21_HTM_SAB09517C7249690A58CF802B9F269C6C">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	termination of this Lease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	failure to furnish proof of such insurance shall in no way relieve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	of such insurance obligations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Signs.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any sign or display visible from the exterior of the Property must be approved by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;in advance, which approval will be given only if and so long as any such sign or display strictly conforms to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;signage plan for the Property.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will be permitted one identification sign on the front building fascia above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;entranceway, if it complies with such plan; but any other signage rights for the Property are separately negotiated and must be set forth in any &#8220;Special Provisions&#8221; attached.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	PART C.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	REPAIR AND RESTORATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S Obligations. LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	at its sole expense, shall make all necessary repairs to the footings, foundation, structural steel columns-, exterior walls and girders forming a part of the Premises, provided that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	shall not have responsibility to make any repair until
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	receives written notice of the need for such repair and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	confirms such repair is necessary.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	represents and warrants that the Property contains no structural defects and requires no major repairs or replacements, all building systems are in good working order at the time of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	occupancy, and the Property is served by all utilities necessary for the operation thereof as typical office space of similar type and kind. -Additionally,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	liability to repair the HVAC systems shall be limited to no more than One Thousand Five Hundred ($1,500.00) Dollars annually for the term of the lease. Should an HVAC unit require replacement during the term of the lease,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	shall replace the unit at its sole expense as a capital expense for the Property. Subject to the limitations set forth in this Section D.1,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	sole expense, shall maintain and repair the HVAC systems appur
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	tenant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;to the Premises.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	also maintains the Property&#8217;s Common Utility systems, and, other systems that do not serve the Premises exclusively, and makes all necessary repairs to the roof, grounds, and common areas, the costs of which are an operating expense, payable by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	in its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Share. &#8220;Walls&#8221; excludes windows, glass, plate glass, doors, custom storefronts, and entry areas. Unless this Lease is terminated due to any casualty or taking,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	as and when necessary, (i) restores the Property&#8217;s roof, foundation, exterior walls, common systems, and common areas, and (ii) restores any improvements, equipment, and installations within or serving the Premises, except those installed by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	account. Notwithstanding the foregoing,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is not obligated to restore any damage caused by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Reasonable advance written notice is an absolute condition precedent to
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	duty to maintain, repair or restore.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	liability for any unjustified failure to maintain, repair or restore the Premises or the Property, as required by this paragraph, is limited to the costs of performing such maintenance, reparation or restoration, as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is not liable for any consequential loss or damage.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Right to Self-Cure:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	reserves the right to contract for repair work not performed or scheduled by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	within three (3) business days of defect or repair notification to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	in writing. Should
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	fail to pay the invoice,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may pay the invoice and abate the payment amount on subsequent rent payment(s) until the payment amount has been satisfied.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S Obligations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Except for work that expressly is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	responsibility under the previous paragraph,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	(i) maintains the Premises, including any leasehold improvements, fixtures, equipment, and other installations, in a safe, sound serviceable, and reasonably attractive condition, and (ii) restores the Premises and any leasehold improvements, fixtures, equipment, and other installations, as and when necessary. Unless this Lease is terminated because of any casualty or taking, as expressly provided in this Lease,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	promptly will undertake any required maintenance or restoration and pursue it diligently and continuously to completion. The conditions applicable to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	installations apply to any such work that requires any substantial construction activities on or about the Premises.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	maintenance and restoration include:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage113"></A>
<A NAME="EX10_21_HTM_SAB09517C7249690A58CF802B9F269C6C">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Interior. Floor coverings, wall coverings (including painted surfaces), finished ceilings, and termite &amp; pest extermination.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Systems. All plumbing, electrical, and mechanical equipment, fixtures, and systems serving the Premises exclusively, including any exterior lighting serving the Premises exclusively.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Damage. Restoring any damage to the Property caused by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or any person subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	right of control or actual control, or resulting from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	occupancy.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Entries. Windows, glass, plate glass, doors, custom storefronts, and entries, including any loading doors and related equipment, fixtures, and appurtenances, such as dock boards and bumpers.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Debris. Removal from the Property of trash, debris, and materials accumulated in connection with any activity of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	on or about the Premises.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Casualty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. If the property or premises should be substantially destroyed by fire or other casualty,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;may, at their option, terminate this Lease by giving written notice thereof within thirty (30) days of such casualty. In such event, the Rent shall be apportioned to and shall cease as of the date of such casualty. If
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;does not exercise this option, then the Property shall be reconstructed and restored by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	expense, to substantially the same condition as prior to the casualty, and in the event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;business is substantially interrupted, Rent shall abate as set forth in Paragraph D.5 below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Restoration.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Provided neither party has terminated the lease in accordance with paragraph D.3,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will have a reasonable time not exceeding Two Hundred Ten (210) days from the date of the casualty to complete any restoration required or elected by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	so long as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	undertakes it promptly and pursues it diligently and continuously to completion. If the Premises are not restored within Two Hundred Ten (210) days after the occurrence,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, to the exclusion of any other rights or remedies, may elect to terminate this Lease without further liability. The foregoing time period will be extended for any delays resulting from any circumstances beyond
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	control, but not exceeding a total of Sixty (60) days in any event.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Abatement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If, because of any casualty,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;normal business activities cannot be conducted within or from the Premises in substantially the same fashion as conducted immediately before the occurrence, then the rent will abate during the period of restoration in a fair and equitable manner, proportionate with the degree of interference with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;normal business operations, as conducted immediately before the occurrence.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Taking.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	If, as a result of any taking, the Premises no longer can be used for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;normal business operations, as conducted immediately before the taking, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;so certifies in good faith to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;may elect to terminate this Lease and surrender possession as otherwise required by this Lease, without further liability, and effective as of the date of the taking, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;surrender of possession, whichever is later.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	also may terminate this Lease if, as a result of any taking,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	determines that the continued operation of the Property is not economically feasible and so certifies to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;in good faith. In all other events, this Lease will continue notwithstanding any taking.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Proceeds. TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;has no claim, right, title, or interest in or to any proceeds of any physical damage, business interruption, or rental loss insurance maintained by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	with respect to the Property.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;has no right or remedy with respect to any proceeds payable in connection with any taking affecting the Property, except
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;may recover any items of consequential damage, such as business interruption and relocation expense, that may be awarded separately from, and which do not reduce, the award to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	for the Property.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:96PX;">
	PART D.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GENERAL COVENANTS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Services. TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will obtain, pay for, and indemnify
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;with respect to any electrical, natural gas, climate control, janitorial refuse collection, security, telecommunications, and other services required for the Premises.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	furnishes only the common utilities.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;is not
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage114"></A>
<A NAME="EX10_21_HTM_SAB09517C7249690A58CF802B9F269C6C">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	responsible for any unintentional interruption of any services, provided such interruption is not the result of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;gross negligence, willful misconduct or breach of this Lease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may interrupt such services as required for repairs, inspections, construction activities, and other legitimate business purposes, provided that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	shall take all reasonable steps to avoid interfering with the operation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	business in the Premises.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	does not contemplate furnishing manned or other special security systems for the Property.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	solely is responsible for any security systems required by the nature of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	business and will indemnify
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	against any claims because of any failure to furnish such systems.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;shall maintain its existing exterior lighting and lighting schedule of dusk to 10:00 PM and 5:00AM to dawn, but shall not be required to furnish any additional exterior illumination, nor shall it be required to extend the hours of illumination.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Regulations. LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	from time to time may establish, change, and enforce uniform, commercially reasonable rules and regulations with respect to the Property and any activities conducted on or about the Property. Without limitation,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may regulate the time and place of deliveries to and from the Property, the use of the Property&#8217;s parking and other common areas, and such other matters as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	determines are necessary, convenient, or desirable to maintain the Property as a first class facility.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will comply with all rules and regulations within ten (10) days after notice, unless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	permits a longer time in which to achieve compliance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	willful failure to comply after the relevant notice and cure period shall be an immediate Event of Default. Notwithstanding the foregoing,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	shall not discriminate against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	in the enforcement of any rules and regulations.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Entry. LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	has a reasonable right of entry to the Premises for any lawful purpose, including inspections, maintenance, restoration, and removal of any installation made in violation of the express requirements of this Lease, provided that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	provides
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	with twenty-four (24) hours advance notice and takes all reasonable steps necessary to minimize disruption with the operation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	business in the Premises.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may enter the Premises during normal business hours for construction activities relating to maintenance, restoration, and renovation of the Property.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	also may so enter to exhibit the Premises to actual or prospective purchasers, mortgagees, and tenants.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	has retained duplicate passkeys to the Premises.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	may change the lock to the Premises, so long as (i) the changed locks are at least as secure as the originals, and (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	immediately is furnished duplicate passkeys to the new or additional locks. &#8220;Lock&#8221; and &#8220;passkey&#8221; are to be interpreted in the broadest sense to include, respectively, any installation, device, or system that secures the Premises against unauthorized entry, and the means for opening, accessing, or defeating each such installation, device, or system, as the case may be.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Subordination. TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	interest in the Property is and at all times will remain subject, subordinate, and inferior to the lien and other security of any mortgages encumbering
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	interest in the Property now or in the future. _Within ten (10) days after demand,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will execute &amp; deliver such assurances of the subordination as the holder of any such mortgage may require, provided that the holder of any such mortgage shall have agreed in writing, and shall be bound thereby, to honor all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;rights under this Lease, including, without limitation,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;rights of quiet and exclusive use and enjoyment of the Premises.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Indemnity. LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is not liable for any damage, injury, or death of or to any person or property unless caused by the gross negligence or willful misconduct of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD. TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	will indemnify and hold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	harmless from and against:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Injury. Any injury or damage to, or the death or destruction of, any person or property arising from or in connection with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;possession, use, installation, maintenance, restoration, alteration, or improvement of the Premises, or any activity conducted, or condition created, upon or from the Property by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;during the term of this Lease.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Violations. Any violation by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of any provision of this Lease, any legal requirement, or any insurance requirement during the term of this Lease.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage115"></A>
<A NAME="EX10_21_HTM_SAB09517C7249690A58CF802B9F269C6C">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Contests. Any claim, proceeding, or contest by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;in connection with any insurance proceeds or settlement, or any award for taking.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will defend any action, suit or proceeding brought against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or the Property because of any such occurrence by counsel reasonably acceptable to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;obligations under this paragraph survive the expiration or any earlier termination of this Lease as to claims based upon any occurrence, or condition created by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;before the termination date. Nothing in this Lease requires
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;to indemnify
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;with respect to any willful or intentional acts of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, or of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;agents, employees, or contractors. As used in this paragraph, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221; includes persons acting for or on behalf of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, its subtenants, agents, employees, contractors, and invitees.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will indemnify and hold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;harmless from and against any injury or damage to, or the death or destruction of, any person or property arising from or in connection with (i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;installation, maintenance, restoration, alteration, improvement of the Premises, or any activity conducted, or condition created, upon or from the Property by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;during the term of this Lease; (ii) any violation by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;of any provision of this Lease, any legal requirement, or any insurance requirement during the term of this Lease. As used in this paragraph, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#8221; includes persons acting for or on behalf of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, its agents, employees, contractors, and invitees.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Liens Generally
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will not create, or permit to be created or to remain, and will discharge or bond against, any lien, encumbrance, or adverse claim to or against the Property,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, or the rent that arises, or is asserted to arise, by, through, under, or against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Without limitation,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will transfer any such lien, encumbrance, or claim to substitute security in the manner permitted by applicable law upon demand. If
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;fails to make ally such transfer,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, without waiving, limiting, or otherwise impairing any other right or remedy, may make it at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;expense.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mechanic&#8217;s Liens.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Any lien for any labor, services, or materials performed, rendered, or delivered to the Property pursuant to a contract with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, or any person other than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	is limited to the interest in the Property, if any, of the person contracting for such labor, services, or materials, as the case may be.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	interest in the Property is not subject to any lien or claim of lien for any such labor, services, or materials.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;has no power to authorize or contract on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	behalf for any such work or otherwise to subject
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	interest in the Property to any claim relating to any such work.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will comply with any applicable requirements of any Mechanic&#8217;s Lien Law with respect to any work by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;that is or may be subject to its provisions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Insurance Required.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Without limiting, and as security for,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;indemnity contained in this Lease,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will maintain general liability insurance with respect to the Premises in commercially reasonable amounts equaling or exceeding the Insurance Limits shown on the Summary Page of this Lease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;also will maintain (i) workmen&#8217;s compensation insurance in the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;full statutory liability, if any, and (ii) physical damage insurance with respect to any improvements, equipment, fixtures, and other installations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;is obligated to restore by the express provisions of this Lease. As and when required by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;for any installation, maintenance, or restoration by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;pursuant to the express provisions of this Lease,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;also will maintain physical damage insurance with respect to such work or installation, or both, as the case may be.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. All insurers must be authorized to do business in the state where the Property is situated and well-rated by any recognized national rating organization. Except for workmen&#8217;s compensation insurance, any policies required to be maintained by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will name
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;as additional insured, as its respective interests may appear, will be reasonably satisfactory to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, and may provide for commercially reasonable deductible amounts. Any insurance may be carried under blanket policies, so long as each policy provides a reserved amount for the Property so that the amount of insurance required by this Lease will be available notwithstanding any losses elsewhere. Any policies maintained by either
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage116"></A>
<A NAME="EX10_21_HTM_SAB09517C7249690A58CF802B9F269C6C">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;with respect to the Property that do not name
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;as co-insured or additional insured at all times will carry a waiver of subrogation endorsement, as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;mutually waive the benefit of subrogation by their respective insurers with respect to any loss occurring on, about, or with respect to the Property.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Certificates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Each policy required to be maintained by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;must (i) provide prior written notice to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and any mortgagee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;interest in the Property of suspension, cancellation, termination, modification, non-renewal, lapse, or material change of coverage, and (ii) not contain any provision relieving the insurer of liability for any loss because of the existence of other policies of insurance, regardless of collectability.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	, and any mortgagee of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;interest in the Property, at all times must hold satisfactory certificates, or original, duplicate, or certified policies, evidencing any insurance required to be maintained by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. All property insurance certificates shall be in the form &#8220;Accord 27&#8221;. Prior to the expiration of any policy,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will furnish
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;and such mortgagees with similar evidence of its renewal. During any time that substantial construction may be in progress at the Property, any required physical damage insurance with respect to such construction must be in the form of builder&#8217;s risk completed value, non-reporting coverage, and otherwise in the form, content, and in such amounts as required by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will maintain in full force and effect at all times during the term of the Lease fire and extended coverage, vandalism and malicious mischief, and special extended perils, &#8220;all risks&#8221;, on the Property and the Premises in the amount equal to the full replacement cost thereof, public liability and broad form property damage insurance in an amount equal to the full replacement value of the property with combined single limit coverage with an insurance company licensed in South Carolina. Upon request,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;will furnish to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;with duly executed certificates of insurance evidencing the coverage as provided by all such policies.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;shall be named as an additional insured under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;public liability insurance.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Assignment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;may not mortgage, pledge, or otherwise encumber its interest in the Property, this Lease, any sublease of the Premises, or any subrents. Any such mortgage, pledge, or encumbrance is voidable, at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;option, and an immediate Event of Default.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;may sublease the Premises or assign
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;interest in this Lease only with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;advance written consent in each instance, which consent will not be unreasonably withheld, provided the following conditions are met:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Subordination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Any sublease or assignment expressly is subject to the provisions of this Lease.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Prepayments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. No sublease permits the sub tenant to pay rent in advance for a period of more than one month.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Impairment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	No such sublease or assignment alters, diminishes, or impairs any of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	obligations under this Lease, or any rights or remedies of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Each such sublease or assignment is to an affiliated or successor entity of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	with equal or greater net worth, that will conduct a business on or from the Premises that is substantially the same as, or reasonably related or incidental to,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	business, and will not increase the use of any of the Property&#8217;s common areas.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Rent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	. Any increased rent, or consideration in lieu of rent, is paid to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:16PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	Notwithstanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	consent to any sublease or assignment, all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	obligations under this Lease continue as the obligations of a principal, and not a guarantor or surety, to the same extent as though no such assignment or sublease has been made.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TENANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	shall pay, within ten (10) days of receipt of an invoice, which shall not exceed $500.00,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	reasonable attorney fees and costs in connection with the review and documentation of any transfer, for which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LANDLORD&#8217;S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	consent is requested.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
